beer.beer_description: A light and refreshing pale golden beer with hints of banana and pineapple. Crafted with a fine blend of the best English malted barley and mainly fresh local Fuggles hops from Puttenham but with some aroma hops at the end of the boil. A good balanced beer with a long dry finish and a sense of sweetness.

items.badge_description: Sometimes you need a break from all the hops, fruits, and spices. What better way than with a crisp, smooth Blonde Ale or Golden Ale? Basic but delicious. That's 10 different beers with the style of Blonde Ale or Golden Ale. Try 5 more for Level 3!
Had enough tea and biscuits? Head to the pub for a pint! That's at least 55 beers from the UK. Try 5 more for Level 12.

While a pint of traditional English ale will always remain a staple, the craft beer scene in England, much like the rest of the world, has continued to grow at a rapid rate! That's 40 different beers from a brewery from England! Try 5 more for Level 9!

A good balanced beer with a long dry finish and a sense of sweetness.

items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 450 check-ins at venue that is verified.  Try 5 more for Level 91!

items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 25 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 6!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 25 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 6!

items.checkin_comment: Quite a nice winter malty ale with subtle caramel tones

user.bio: I love all types of beer, but the variety of English ales available is heaven!

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 15 distinct venues!
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 45 check-ins with a photo.

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 40 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 9!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 25 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 6!

items.badge_description: Guess what? We’re officially 14! From October 22nd to October 27th, we’re celebrating Untappd’s 14th anniversary (woo woo)! Thanks to every one of you for making this beautifully diverse community what it is today! Let’s raise our glasses, check in a brew, earn this badge, and cheers to the next 14 years of memories with you! For extra credit, be sure to check out the latest Hop Culture piece on the beers with most 5-star check-ins on Untappd so far in 2024.

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 40 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 9!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 20 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 5!

While a pint of traditional English ale will always remain a staple, the craft beer scene in England, much like the rest of the world, has continued to grow at a rapid rate! That's 5 different beers from a brewery from England! Try 5 more for Level 2!

items.badge_description: 99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 30 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 7!
